home.welcome-text: The best bakery in town, bringing fresh bread and irresistible sweets every day.
home.breads-text: Fresh bread made daily with the finest ingredients.
home.cakes-text: Delicious cakes for all occasions, with a taste you'll love.
home.candys-text: Sweets made with love, perfect to sweeten your day.
home.visit-us-text: Come and try our fresh and delicious products. We are waiting for you!

products.our-products-text: Check out the variety of delicious products we offer.
products.breads-text: Freshly baked breads, made daily with the finest ingredients.
products.cakes-text: Delicious cakes for every occasion, with flavors you'll love.
products.candys-text: Handcrafted sweets, perfect to brighten your day.
